text:
[Verse]
Golden sky lights up the town
Shadows stretch as sun goes down
Day's end brings quiet
No more sound
Peace in the dusk we've found

[Verse 2]
Clouds are painted
Pink and red
Stars awaken overhead
Night's whisper on dreams we're fed
Softly now
We tread

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams
Oh we fly
Underneath this painted sky
Hold my hand
Don't say goodbye
In this moment you and I

[Verse 3]
Crickets sing their evening tune
Silver light from rising moon
Hearts in sync
A perfect boon
Peaceful night comes soon

[Verse 4]
Every night we see this glow
Every dusk the magic grows
In these colors
Love will show
In this time
We know

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams
Oh we fly
Underneath this painted sky
Hold my hand
Don't say goodbye
In this moment you and I
title: Sunset Dreams
